beneficiary().details: Returns the address of the beneficiary.

params.masterChef_: The address of the master chef contract.
params.start_: The timestamp at which the vesting starts.
params.token_: The address of the token contract.

duration().details: Returns the duration of the vesting.

end().details: Returns the timestamp at which the vesting ends.

returns._0: The timestamp at which the vesting ends.

masterChef().details: Returns the address of the master chef contract.

returns._0: The address of the master chef contract.

releasable().details: Returns the amount of tokens that can be released.

returns._0: The amount of tokens that can be released.

release().details: Releases the vested tokens to the beneficiary.

released().details: Returns the amount of tokens that have been released.

returns._0: The amount of tokens that have been released.

revoked().details: Returns whether the vesting contract has been revoked.

returns._0: Whether the vesting contract has been revoked.

params.newBeneficiary: The address of the new beneficiary.

start().details: Returns the timestamp at which the vesting starts.

returns._0: The timestamp at which the vesting starts.

token().details: Returns the address of the token contract.

returns._0: The address of the token contract.

vestedAmount(uint256).details: Returns the amount of tokens that have been vested at the specified timestamp.

params.timestamp: The timestamp at which the amount of vested tokens will be calculated.

returns._0: The amount of tokens that have been vested at the specified timestamp.
